name: PTO & Leave Management
description: PTO and leave management system with accrual tracking and approvals

prd.problem: Managing worker time off requests, tracking PTO balances, and planning crew schedules around absences is currently manual, leading to scheduling conflicts, incorrect PTO balances, and disputes over available time off.
prd.solution: Implement a comprehensive PTO management system with configurable accrual rules, leave type definitions (vacation, sick, personal, etc.), request/approval workflows, balance tracking, and integration with crew scheduling to prevent understaffing.
successCriteria: Workers can view their PTO balances in real-time
Flexible accrual rules (per pay period, annual, etc.)
Multiple leave types with separate balances
Alerts when PTO request would cause understaffing
assumptions: Workers have access to submit requests
outOfScope: FMLA and other regulated leave tracking
Integration with payroll for PTO payout
risks: Complex accrual rules may be difficult to configure
Ensuring fair and consistent PTO approval
Preventing scheduling gaps due to multiple concurrent absences
